name: Dual-Run Testing
tests_completed: TEST-002: coderef-workflow reads plan.json via symlink
FIX-SYMLINK: Recreated broken symlink to enable live artifact sharing
TEST-003: Concurrent read/write operations between MCPs work without conflicts
TEST-004: Full workflow integration test passed - both MCPs synchronized
key_findings: Symlink initially created as static copy, not live link - fixed by recreating
After symlink fix, both MCPs can access shared artifacts
Concurrent operations work correctly with proper serialization
Shared artifact model validated - ready for Phase 3 (Migration)
next_phase: Phase 3: Migration - Update slash commands to call coderef-workflow instead of docs-mcp

name: Migration
tasks_completed: MIGRATE-001: Updated /create-workorder command to call coderef-workflow
MIGRATE-002: Updated /execute-plan command to call coderef-workflow
MIGRATE-004: Verified all migrated commands in global ~/.claude/commands/
key_achievements: All slash commands now call coderef-workflow MCP instead of docs-mcp
New /update-task-status command created for task tracking
All commands deployed to global ~/.claude/commands/ directory
Zero user-facing disruption - commands work identically from user perspective
